title: Konsult - Newsec Interim Solutions
description:
*Är du konsult inom fastighetsbranschen eller går i tankarna om att ta steget dit? Anslut dig till vårt konsultnätverk och ta del av spännande uppdragsmöjligheter!*
 Newsec Interim Solutions erbjuder kvalificerade och erfarna konsulter för tillfälliga uppdrag inom fastighetsbranschen. Vi har ett brett nätverk av kompetenta interimskonsulter som hjälper våra kunder med allt från projektledning och förvaltning till affärsutveckling och strategi.
   

  

 Med över 40 kontrakterade konsulter hos företag som Castellum, Vasakronan och Corem är vi specialiserade på lösningar inom fastighetsbranschen.
   

  

 Vi tillsätter uppdrag inom:
   

  

* Fastighetsförvaltning
* Uthyrning
* Management
* Etablering
* Projektledning
* Projektutveckling
* Ekonomi/controlling
* Hyresadministration


 Oavsett roll ser vi till att ha rätt konsult tillgänglig i rätt tid och vi arbetar för att vara det självklara valet för både kunder och konsulter.
   

  

**Hur arbetar vi?**
 Varje uppdrag är unikt och vi strävar efter att göra den bästa matchningen av konsult för att uppfylla det specifika behovet i din organisation. Vi kvalitetssäkrar våra konsulter genom intervjuer, bakgrundskontroll, tester samt referenstagning för att säkerställa hög standard och långsiktiga relationer med både våra konsulter och våra uppdragsgivare.
   

  

**Vill du bli en del av vårt konsultnätverk?**
 Vi söker efter dig som vill arbeta som konsult inom fastighetsbranschen och delar vår vision om att leverera högkvalitativa resultat. Som konsult ser vi att du är en prestigelös individ som trivs i en föränderlig miljö och snabbt kan sätta dig in i verksamheten och leverera. Du är även självgående och uppskattar att dela med dig av dina erfarenheter.
   

  

 Som uppdragspartner vill vi erbjuda dig som konsult kompetensutveckling, kunskapsutbyte och samhörighet. Därmed bjuder vi löpande in våra konsulter till bland annat gästföreläsningar, kurser och nätverksträffar. Bli en del av vårt nätverk så är du varmt välkommen att delta vid nästa tillfälle!
   

  

*Vi ser fram emot att lära känna dig och utforska de möjligheter som väntar. Tillsammans skapar vi framgångsrika interimslösningar inom fastighetsbranschen.*

title: Analytics Engineer
description:
**Analytics Engineer**
 Are you passionate about transforming data into insight and impact? Do you thrive at the intersection of analytics, technology, and business? Excited to help shape the future of audio content with reliable and actionable insights? If so, we’d love to hear from you.
   

  

 As part of our mission at Podme to build joyful and habit-forming listening experiences across the Nordics, we’re looking for a talented Analytics Engineer—with a focus on analytical insight and stakeholder collaboration—to join our team in Stockholm. In this role, you’ll work closely with teams across product, marketing, engineering, and beyond, ensuring that our decisions are informed by accurate insights. Your contributions will drive strategic decisions and fuel growth and innovation across our subscription platform.
   

  

 This is a unique opportunity to make your mark at a fast-growing company where creativity meets data and where podcasts are just the beginning.
   

  

 What You’ll Do
   

  

* Transform and model data to ensure clean, trustworthy, and reusable datasets for reporting and analysis.
* Design and maintain dashboards that track key business, product, and marketing KPIs.
* Collaborate with marketing teams to analyse customer lifecycle data and identify growth opportunities.
* Partner with product and engineering to implement and refine tracking strategies across our platforms.
* Conduct deep-dive analyses to generate insights that shape content and product development.
* Work closely with Data Engineers to set up robust validation checks and resolve data discrepancies proactively.
* Collaborate with stakeholders and cross-functional teams to gather requirements and translate data needs into actionable solutions.


 What You Bring
   

  

 You’re not just great with data, you know how to make it matter. You love digging into complex data domains, building scalable solutions, and communicating your findings in a way that informs and inspires.
   

  

* Hands-on experience as an Analytics Engineer, Data Analyst, or similar role with a focus on analytics and stakeholder collaboration.
* Strong SQL skills and experience working with cloud data warehouses like BigQuery.
* Experience with dbt and modern data transformation practices.
* Ability to build clear, insightful dashboards in tools like Looker Studio (or similar).
* Understanding of data modeling principles and analytics best practices.
* Strong communicator who can turn complex data into actionable stories for a range of stakeholders.
* Bonus: Familiarity with Python, Airflow, Braze, GA4, or experience in subscription-based media or audio platforms.
* Extra kudos: Familiarity with data privacy regulations.


 What We’re Looking For
   

  

* A structured thinker who connects data to real-world outcomes.
* A curious mind who asks the right questions and finds answers in the numbers.
* A collaborative communicator who shares insights clearly.
* A problem-solver who blends technical skill with business context.


 Why Join Podme?
   

  

 At Podme, we believe in the power of audio stories to inform, entertain, and inspire. Backed by Schibsted—one of the Nordics’ leading media groups—we’re on a mission to deliver the best of podcasting and beyond to listeners across Sweden, Norway, and Finland.
   

  

* Dynamic Environment: Make an impact at a fast-growing company.
* Supportive Culture: Collaborate with a team that values knowledge-sharing and continuous learning.
* Hybrid Flexibility: Enjoy 3-4 days per week in our Stockholm office, balancing flexibility with team connection.
* Wellness Perks: Access healthcare benefits and wellness allowances.
* Premium Content Access: Listen to our exclusive shows–on the house.


 Help us power the Nordic podcast revolution with insight-driven decisions.
   

  

 Your next great challenge starts here.
   

  

 Apply now and let’s build something great together.

title: Senior App Developer
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.
   

  

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*
**Your Profile (Must-have Requirements)**
* Senior experience in app development, preferably with multiplatform frameworks (such as React Native or Kotlin Multiplatform), but also with deep knowledge of iOS and/or Android.
* Experience with authentication, app security, or digital identity is highly meritorious.
* Ability to quickly learn and adapt to new technologies and integration solutions.
* Experience working with hardware-related features (Bluetooth, NFC) and encryption is strongly desired.
* Used to working in small, autonomous teams and able to take on significant responsibility.


**Application deadline:** 
 23-10-2025
   

  

**About Us**
 We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.
   

  

 Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?
   

  

 We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.
   

  

 🌟 A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.
   

  

 🚗 Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.
   

  

 💼 Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.
   

  

 🌴 Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?
   

  

 🏥 Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.
   

  

 📚 Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.
   

  

 🕑 Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?
   

  

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Senior Data Engineer/Data Analyst
description:
**S E N I O R D A T A E N G I N E E R**
*Data & Analytics*
**\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_**
 Full-time | Permanent | Göteborg/Stockholm/Malmö
   

  

**O M X E N I T**
 Xenit är ett konsultbolag med kontor i Göteborg (HQ), Stockholm och Malmö (som för närvarande är vårt nav för Data Analytics). Och om du inte redan visste det, är vi Microsofts Partner of the Year i Sverige 2024 🎉 (se bevis här).
   

  

 En stor anledning till denna framgång är vårt arbete med bland annat Co-pilot och AI, något som visar att vi är ett modernt företag som investerar i AI, data och molntjänster.
   

  

 Vårt mål är inte bara att vara den bästa molnpartnern i Sverige, utan också den
 *SNÄLLASTE* 
 💞
   

  

 Om du ser dig själv som en driven och ambitiös person med goda tekniska färdigheter och vill utvecklas som konsult kan Xenit mycket väl vara platsen för dig.
   

  

**V A D V I B E H Ö V E R
 **🙏****
 Vi söker en Senior Data Engineer/Data Analyst som vill ansluta till ett team av experter och drivna juniorer.
   

  

 Vi är intresserade av någon som arbetar med data- och molnlösningar, särskilt
 **Azure** 
 och/eller
 **Power BI** 
 . Du och dina teammedlemmar kommer att arbeta, med lösningar så som
 **Fabric** 
 ,
 **Databricks** 
 och
 **Power** 
**Platform** 
 , nära slutanvändarna för att skapa affärsvärde.
   

  

 Du kommer att vara involverad i lösningsdesign och utveckling för både små och stora kunder, med vilka vi har byggt starka relationer och där våra konsulter spelar en viktig roll i deras långsiktiga strategi.
   

  

**Exempel På Potentiella Uppgifter**
* Designa, bygga och underhålla dataflöden/arkitekturer för databearbetning
* Integrera stora datamängder från flera datakällor och utföra datamodellering
* Bidra till att ständigt förbättra vårt sätt att arbeta inom dataanalys
* Vara med och utveckla och förfina befintliga dataanalystjänster/-produkter på Xenit


**K A N D U V A R A E N M A T C H ?**
**Vi tror att vår nästa Data Engineer/Data Analyst har:**
* Cirka 5 års erfarenhet inom dataanalys
* Kompetens inom ETL/ELT-utveckling
* Praktisk erfarenhet av Azure Data Factory och/eller Fabric
* Erfarenhet inom datamodellering/design/arkitektur
* God kunskap inom Power BI


**Det Är Ett Plus Om Du Har Kunskap Inom**
* Azure Synapse Analytics
* Data Lake/Data Lakehouse
* Python eller R
* Microsoft Purview


**Vi Tror Också Att Du Är En Person Som**
* Talar och skriver flytande svenska och engelska
* Är självgående, får saker att hända och tar ansvar för ditt eget arbete
* Har ett metodiskt och strukturerat sätt att arbeta
* Kan snabbt förstå och analysera komplexa frågor
* Samarbetar effektivt med andra och bygger goda relationer med både kunder och kollegor
* Tycker om att dela kunskap och erfarenheter för att stödja kollegor i att nå gemensamma mål
* Framför allt visar vänlighet och medkänsla i allt de gör 💕


**V A R F Ö R V
 **Ä** 
 L J A X E N I T ?**
**F Ö R M Å N E R** 
 🎁
   

  

 Xenit har ett stort förmånspaket, inklusive men inte begränsat till: Friskvårdsbidrag, sjukförsäkring, sjukvårdsförsäkring, föräldrautfyllnad och mer. För fullständig lista över förmåner, se här.
   

  

**U T M Ä R K E L S E R** 
 🏅
   

  

 "Karriärföretag 2024". Detta erkännande understryker vårt engagemang för att främja en arbetsplatskultur som värdesätter inkludering, välbefinnande och tillväxt.
   

  

 "Xenit är en enastående arbetsgivare där företagskultur och välbefinnande står i centrum. Här är de anställda en del av en varm och inkluderande gemenskap där deras välbefinnande prioriteras. Genom att erbjuda en miljö där samarbete, kreativitet och innovation uppmuntras, kan medarbetarna trivas och utvecklas samtidigt som de bidrar till företagets framgång." Läs mer om Karriärföretagen här.
   

  

 Microsoft Partner of the Year Sweden 2024 🎉
   

  

* vad tusan väntar du på? Sök nu!


 Xenit's goal is not only to become Sweden's leading cloud partner, but to be Sweden's kindest cloud partner.
   

  

 Our theory is that satisfied workers produce satisfying work, and so we aim to create a working environment in which our employees can thrive - working independently, flexibly and happily.
   

  

 We are happy with hybrid remote working, encourage collaboration between offices and freedom in choosing devices/equipment & working hours.
   

  

 Why not find out more about us?

title: Graduates 2026 - Data Engineering
description:
Are you a data enthusiast interested in the foundational aspects of data such as engineering scalable pipelines, integrating diverse data sources, and ensuring data quality for AI and analytics? Do you want to immediately jump into real client projects, applying and growing your skills as you build robust data solutions that drive business impact from day one? Then join us at Curamando and turn your passion into impactful, groundbreaking solutions!
   

  

 Curamando is a fast-growing consultancy offering services in areas such as data infrastructure, cloud-based analytics solutions, and enabling data-driven decision making, working with clients like Polestar, Samsung and McDonalds. We are part of the Nordic consulting house, Eidra, with our main office on the newly refurbished block Grev Tureplan 1 in central Stockholm. In total, we are 1400 innovators, located in nine offices from Stockholm to New York.
   

  

**About The Graduate Position**
 We are looking for students graduating in the Summer of 2026 to join our Data Foundation team in August. Our team consists of experts in data & analytics engineering, data architecture, and building modern data foundations, while also collaborating closely with specialists in AI, ML, and data science. This means you’ll have the opportunity to deepen your expertise in foundational data engineering as well as to expand your skills across the broader data and analytics landscape, always aligned with your personal goals and interests
   

  

 Coming directly from university, you would be joining us as an Analyst, our entry level position. As an Analyst, you will be working alongside senior colleagues and helping with implementing our digital solutions for clients. We believe that learning and doing are important parts of your early career, which is why we immediately want you to get your hands dirty (with code) and get to try out the skills you’ve developed during your education.
   

  

**General Responsibilities Include**
* Partaking in client conversations and projects
* Designing and implementing modern cloud-based data platforms
* Designing, building and maintaining high quality, scalable data pipelines and integrating diverse data sources
* Automating and optimizing complex data workflows
* Collaborating across teams within both Curamando and the other Eidra companies
* Representing Curamando in the data and analytics community through outreach, knowledge sharing, and continuous learning about the latest technologies within the field.


**The Analyst Program**
 As a Graduate, you will also have the opportunity to participate in our Analyst Program along with fellow graduates from different domains, packed with exciting events and courses! The Analyst program includes a set of courses, designed to ensure that you, during your first year at Curamando, develop the crucial skills to be a professional data consultant. It also includes social activities and meeting and visiting colleagues from our different companies and offices around the world.
   

  

**Who We Are Looking For**
 To be a good fit for this role, we believe that you:
   

  

* will be graduating in the Summer of 2026 with a master’s degree in computer science, computer engineering, information systems, mathematics, statistics, data engineering, or a related field with a strong interest in data infrastructure and engineering
* have skills in SQL, python or similar languages
* have skills in, or a strong interest in learning about, data related methods and solutions to drive company growth
* are a curious, collaborative team player, eager to grow and learn
* have great communication skills, both written and verbal, in English
* are based in Stockholm, or able to move here


**Our Recruitment Process And How To Apply**
* Submit your CV, outlining your educational background and relevant work experience.
* If you meet our initial criteria, you will be invited to complete an online test assessing your personality traits.
* Selected candidates will then be invited to complete a case that should take 3-4 hours to complete at home.
* After reviewing the case submissions, successful candidates will be invited to an Assessment Day at our Stockholm office.
* Assessment Day will take place at the beginning of December and will include presentations about our organisation, interviews with various team members and HR, and an opportunity to discuss your case approach and receive feedback.
* Following the Assessment Day, we will carefully evaluate your performance and overall fit with our organization to make a final decision regarding your suitability for the position. We are committed to providing feedback to all candidates regardless of the outcome.


 To apply, please click “Apply for this job” and follow the instructions. Apply the latest on 20th of October. We’re looking forward to hearing from you!
   

  

**About Curamando**
 At Curamando, we work in diverse cross-functional teams of business consultants, data and AI/ML experts, project managers, and more. We celebrate autonomy, initiative, and responsibility, while always maintaining a secure support network of fellow colleagues. With tasks ranging from cutting-edge AI implementations to complex and sustainable data architectures, no two days are the same. As a recent graduate, you'll find yourself in an environment that's perfect for learning and development. Rather than being a small cog in the machine, you'll feel the direct impact of your contributions. Because at Curamando, your ideas and efforts aren't just valued - they're essential to both our collective success and your professional growth.
   

  

 Curamando offers tailored consulting services with the best people and assets to help clients build competitive digital marketing and sales capabilities to reach their business goals.
   

  

 We are a part of Eidra, a group of top-notch companies specializing in strategy, creativity, and engineering. As a collective we guide leaders in making meaningful and lasting change.

title: Cybersecurity Lead
description:
**Welcome to Eficode!**
 We are building the future of software development - specialising in AI, Cyber Security, Cloud, DevOps, Agile, and Enterprise Service Management. We’re passionate about sharing our knowledge—not just within our teams, but with the community around us as well. We invest heavily in our people, whether through conferences, training, or other growth opportunities. For our clients, we don't want to be just another cog in the machine; we aim to be the trusted evangelists who show what good truly looks like.
   

  

 Are you a proven cybersecurity leader with an entrepreneurial mindset? We're looking for someone to build, lead, and grow our Cyber Security practice in Sweden. This isn't just about traditional security; it's about delivering sustainable value by tailoring cyber security solutions to client specific needs. This is a chance to build something from the ground up and shape the future of cybersecurity at Eficode.
   

  

**About The Role**
 As our new Cybersecurity Lead for Sweden, you'll be responsible for building the Sweden team from the ground up and expanding our client relationships, particularly within the financial industry and related sectors. This means driving the entire sales process, from identifying new opportunities to signing contracts.
   

  

 The role is a dynamic mix of strategic leadership and hands-on delivery. While you'll be actively involved in client projects in the beginning, the role will transition to focus more on business development and team leadership as the practice grows. Your strategic and hands-on approach will be key to ensuring profitable growth and effective capabilities allocation. You'll act as a strong professional and commercial ambassador, representing Eficode in the market.
   

  

 You will also collaborate with other teams across Eficode, building expertise that links to the rest of the company.
   

  

**Your Key Responsibilities Will Include**
* Building, leading and developing the Cyber Security team in Sweden.
* Building and expanding client relationships, primarily within the financial sector and related industries.
* Driving the entire sales process, from identifying opportunities to signing contracts.
* Ensuring profitable growth and effective resource utilization in the team.
* Developing and executing strategies to position Eficode as a leading GRC player in Sweden.
* Serving as a strong professional and commercial ambassador for the firm.


**Who We Are Looking For**
 The ideal candidate will be a proactive, outgoing, and results-oriented professional with a strong personal brand. You will be an expert in combining sales, delivery, and leadership to achieve business targets.
   

  

* Solid experience (about 10 years) as a consultant within Information and Cyber security
* Proven commercial acumen with the ability to build and grow a client portfolio
* Strategic and hands-on – able to combine sales, delivery, and leadership
* Strong leadership skills with the ability to motivate and develop people
* Results-oriented with a clear understanding of balancing quality, delivery, and profitability
* Relevant academic background, preferably at Master’s level
* Full working proficiency in Swedish (due to customer interactions often being expected to be handled in Swedish)


**Why Eficode?**
* Impact: This is a unique opportunity to build and lead a strong cyber security practice from the ground up, in a growing organization.
* Join a team of bright minds: At Eficode, you will be part of a community of passionate professionals who are dedicated to delivering value and finding the right solutions for our customers.
* Enjoy flexibility and freedom: We offer flexible and hybrid work opportunities, so you can shape your work in a way that fits you best. While there are no set days, you will be expected to meet clients and be active in the market.
* Invest in your growth: We are committed to supporting your development with our own Efi Academy, internal training, and a mentoring program.
* Attractive compensation and benefits: We offer an attractive package of benefits, from medical insurance to social events.


**Ready to build with us?**
 If you're looking forward to building and leading your team to success, we encourage you to apply by submitting your CV, highlighting the projects and the industries you’ve worked on. Please note this is a local position
 **based in the Stockholm region** 
 .
   

  

**Diversity & Inclusion**
*At Eficode we are committed to offering an inclusive recruitment process and equal opportunities for all applicants.*
*We are dedicated to creating a work environment that embraces diversity, inclusion, and respect for all employees. We believe that our differences make us better. We recognize that by having diverse perspectives, skills, ages, genders, backgrounds and cultures we will better drive our customers forward and innovate in our field.*
*To ensure a fair recruitment process, please refrain from sharing unnecessary personal information and your picture on your job application.*
**Salary Statement**
*At Eficode, we believe your compensation should reflect the impact you make and how you grow along the way. Your salary develops through regular check-ins with your team lead, where we look at things like your skills, experience, client work, feedback, and overall contribution — both to your projects and to our culture. As a consultancy, it’s natural that factors like time spent on billable client work are part of the picture — but so are your development, collaboration, and everyday efforts that drive value. We also carry out a company-wide salary review once a year.*
*On top of your salary, we offer a broad mix of benefits, both financial and non-financial, to support your well-being, work-life balance, and professional growth.*
**Find Out More About Our Benefits Here.**
*Eficode, better made possible.*

title: Platform Engineer - IAM till Axfood IT, Stockholm
description:
Välkommen till Axfood IT, en av matbranschens största IT-avdelningar med drygt 350 medarbetare. Det är vi som ser till att Axfood, och alla våra kedjor, kan ligga i framkant vad gäller digital utveckling. Vi jobbar med att utveckla och förbättra allt ifrån e-handel till logistiklösningar och AI.
   

  

 Hos Axfood IT blir du del av ett sammanhang som utmanar och levererar lösningar som gör skillnad, både för våra kollegor och våra kunder. Här finns det alltid möjlighet att lära sig om ny teknik och växa, både som individ och tillsammans med kollegorna.
   

  

**Ditt nya team**
 Avdelningen IT Core är ett av Axfood IT:s mest tekniknära team, med ansvar för plattformar, nätverk, operativ säkerhet och IAM. Du kommer att tillhöra IAM-gruppen, som består av 13 personer med bred kompetens inom identitetshantering, behörigheter och säkerhet. Gruppen arbetar med allt från daglig hantering som tex. tilldelning av konton till arbete med områden som privilegierad åtkomst (PAM), certifikat (PKI), SAP-behörigheter och integrationer mot Microsofts Entra ID. Teamet arbetar med att kontinuerligt förbättra och utveckla vår IAM plattform.
   

  

 Vi står inför en generationsväxling och söker nu dig som vill ta nästa steg inom IAM och vara med och vidareutveckla våra lösningar för framtiden.
   

  

**Ett ax-plock – Kollegornas favoriter på jobbet**
* Att ingå i ett team som värderas högt inom organisationen, med mandat att driva förändring.
* Möjlighet att jobba med moderna lösningar i en komplex och säkerhetskritisk miljö.
* Ett team som välkomnar innovativa lösningar
* Ett team med stark och bred teknisk kompetens, som gillar att ha kul tillsammans, med fika och gärna en AW, för den som vill


**Om rollen**
 I rollen kommer du att arbeta med att utveckla, förvalta och förbättra våra identitets- och åtkomstlösningar. Du kommer att ha ett särskilt fokus på Microsofts Entra ID och tillhörande Microsoft-miljöer som vi inför inom allt fler områden, och arbeta nära både säkerhetsteamet och andra plattformsteam.
   

  

 Dina arbetsuppgifter kommer att inkludera:
   

  

* Arbeta med kontohantering, behörigheter och integrationer med Microsoft Active Directory och Microsoft Entra ID.
* Skriva och underhålla script i PowerShell och MS Graph för bl.a automatisering.
* Delta i projekt kopplade till åtkomsthantering och säkerhet.
* Utforska nya tekniker och lösningar inom identitetshantering.


**Din nya chef har ordet**
*“Vi söker en person som är nyfiken, engagerad och har ett säkerhetstänk i grunden. Du behöver inte vara expert på allt – men du ska vilja förstå, våga driva och bidra till att vi får fart i våra IAM-initiativ."* 
 – Jeanette Thorell Roldin, Tech Platform Area Manager - IT Core
   

  

**Stämmer detta in på dig?**
 För att trivas i rollen tror vi att du har erfarenhet av att arbeta med IAM-lösningar, särskilt inom Microsofts ekosystem. Du är trygg i tekniska miljöer, har ett säkerhetstänk och gillar att ta initiativ.
   

  

**Vi tror att det är viktigt att du:**
* Har erfarenhet av IAM, särskilt inom Microsoft så som hantering av användare, grupper, roller och rättigheter
* Har arbetat med Entra ID och gärna med PowerShell/MS Graph
* Har förståelse för säkerhetsfrågor som Zero Trust-arkitektur och gärna koll på Defender
* Har förståelse för IAM-principer som exempelvis federation SSO, MFA
* Har förmåga att driva arbete framåt, både enskilt och tillsammans.
* Du är nyfiken på ny teknik och delar gärna med dig av din kunskap


 Erfarenhet av Infrastructure as Code är starkt meriterande
   

  

**Ansökningsprocessen**
 Vi vill att det ska vara enkelt att söka jobb hos oss. Om du inte har ett CV redo räcker det med att du länkar en väl ifylld LinkedIn-profil. I din ansökan får du svara på de frågor vi behöver svar på i den här delen av processen, och personligt brev är därför inte obligatoriskt.
   

  

 Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande och tjänsten kan därför tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdag. Vår rekryteringsprocess innehåller tester, intervjuer, bakgrundskontroll och ID-kontroll. Observera att vi inte under denna rekryteringsprocess kommer be dig logga in med ditt Bank-id eller scanna någon QR-kod, men vi kommer be dig styrka din identitet i processens slutskede.
   

  

 Vid frågor om rekrytering på Axfood, kontakta Medarbetarsupporten på jobb@axfood.se. Läs mer: Så går det till när du söker jobb inom Axfood. Om du har frågor om tjänsten, kontakta elisabeth.wehlin@axfood.se. Av GDPR-skäl behandlar vi inga ansökningar eller annan personlig information via mail.
   

  

 Lyssna på en pod om att jobba på Axfood IT, på Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/episode/37BDOFjcKLkdyleKXLEKXZ?si=UVhPBFC4T96dy-tHa9uuDw

title: Lead Data Engineer
description:
Do you want to build data solutions that keep the world moving?
   

  

 TRATON is transforming the transport industry together with its brands Scania, MAN, Volkswagen Truck & Bus, and International. In this role, you will work in close collaboration with Scania in Sweden, contributing to innovative and sustainable solutions that deliver real value for our customers. Our values – customer first, respect, team spirit, responsibility, and elimination of waste – guide everything we do.
   

  

**Role Summary**
 You will be part of a cross-functional team developing data-driven services that improve efficiency and maximize vehicle uptime, making a real difference for Traton’s customers. Our work spans areas such as:
   

  

  

* Generative AI & LLMs
* Predictive Maintenance & Diagnostics
* Computer Vision
* Advanced Analytics
* DataOps & MLOps
* We build on a modern AWS-based ML platform and a Snowflake data platform to deliver scalable, innovative solutions across the Scania ecosystem.


**Job Responsibilities**
* Lead the design, development, and governance of a scalable data platform.
* Drive the transition from Data Lake to Data Mesh.
* Build and maintain reliable data pipelines, APIs, and backend systems.
* Ensure data quality, accessibility, documentation, and compliance across domains.
* Manage governance topics such as user access, data sharing, and compliance to ensure secure and appropriate use of data.
* Collaborate with data scientists, ML engineers, and product teams.
* Contribute to the long-term vision of Traton’s data ecosystem.


**Who You Are**
 You are an experienced Data Engineer with strong backend skills and a passion for building scalable, reliable data solutions. You combine business understanding with technical expertise, and you thrive in a collaborative, innovative environment where the results of your work are directly visible to customers.
   

  

 Besides this, you have/are:
   

  

  

* Solid experience in AWS cloud architecture and data governance.
* Solid experience in using data warehouses such as Snowflake.
* Skilled in data engineering, backend development, and data pipelines.
* Enthusiastic about data quality and cleaning as a foundation for analytics.
* Forward-looking, with a strong interest in Data Mesh principles.
* Strong communicator who can bridge technical and business needs.
* Fluent in English


 Nice to have: Experience using tools like Snowflake, DBT, Witboost, and Collibra.
   

  

**This Is Us**
 Our team is diverse in background and experience, offering great opportunities for both professional and personal growth. We are at the forefront of applying AI technologies in the aftermarket, innovating, prototyping, and deploying solutions in close collaboration with our customers, who value the impact of our work. We foster an environment where people are encouraged to develop, share knowledge, and reach their full potential.
   

  

**Traton Offers**
 We offer a dynamic and flexible workplace with hybrid work options, including access to our Sergel and Midway hubs. You can benefit from training at our health center Gröndal or a wellness allowance, result bonus, flexible working hours, and the possibility of company car leasing. We also host events for employees and their families, and for those living in Stockholm, our Scania Job Express buses provide convenient access to Södertälje.
   

  

**Application**
 Your application should include a CV and any relevant certificates. We welcome all applicants and strive for diversity in our recruitment processes. Apply as soon as possible, no later than 2025-10-30.
   

  

 Screening will take place on an ongoing basis during the application period. Logical and personality tests may be used as part of the selection process, and a background check may be required for this role.
   

  

 If you have questions or would like more information, please contact: Mansoureh Jesmani, hiring manager, Mansoureh.jesmani@scania.com
   

  

 We look forward to your application!
   

  

***This recruitment process is beeing handeled by Scania for TRATON Group R&D.***

title: Kotlin Backend Engineer - Merchant Group
description:
**About Wolt**
 At Wolt, we create technology that brings joy, simplicity and earnings to the neighborhoods of the world. In 2014 we started with delivery of restaurant food. Now we’re building the delivery of (almost) everything and you’ll find us in over 500 cities in 30 countries around the world. In 2022 we joined forces with DoorDash and together we keep on dreaming big and expanding across the globe.
   

  

 Working at Wolt isn’t always easy, but it’s definitely exciting. Here you’ll learn more, build more, and ship more than in most other companies. You’ll be challenged a lot, but also have a lot of fun on the way. So, if you’re a self-starter with drive and entrepreneurial spirit, this could be the ride of your life.
   

  

 We’re looking for experienced Software Engineers to join various teams within the Merchant Group at Wolt! If you have a strong track record of building and maintaining scalable, production-grade systems and want to drive impact at scale, this is the place for you.
   

  

**Who We Are**
 The Merchant Group consists of 150+ engineers across 25+ cross-functional teams, working together to help merchants grow their businesses and streamline operations through innovative technology. Some of us focus on building seamless experiences for our merchants, while others work on the behind-the-scenes magic that makes everything run smoothly.
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
 As an engineer in our group, you’ll work on production-level microservices in Kotlin and Go, helping shape how merchants succeed with Wolt. You’ll have opportunities to:
   

  

* Design, build, and scale reliable systems that power merchant experiences.
* Work across the full development lifecycle – from business logic and testing to cloud infrastructure and data streaming.
* Collaborate on architecture and technology choices that keep our systems simple, scalable, and efficient.
* Grow your skills and knowledge by working alongside experienced teammates in an environment that values learning and experimentation.


**How We Work**
* Autonomy & Ownership – Our engineers have end-to-end responsibility for their services, from implementation to production.
* Collaboration – Architecture and working methods are defined together, ensuring we make the best choices for long-term success.
* Scalability & Simplicity – We value pragmatic solutions that keep our systems robust without unnecessary complexity. We use technologies that serve Wolt, our teams, and our engineers best. You’ll have the freedom to experiment and adopt the tools that work.


 Find out more by checking out our Kotlin-related Tech Talks below:
   

  

* Scaling Kotlin Backend Development Podcast
* Kotlin at Wolt
* Kotlin Meetup


**Our Tech Stack**
 Our core technologies include Kotlin (Ktor, Koin, Spring, gRPC), PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Kafka, Redis, GitHub Actions, AWS, Docker, and Kubernetes.
   

  

**Why Join Us?**
 Wolt is a place where you can learn, teach, and grow. If you’re passionate about building great technology and working in an environment that values teamwork and autonomy, we’d love to hear from you!
   

  

 📍These open roles are based in our tech hubs in Helsinki or Stockholm. We work in distributed teams, but might not be able to offer fully remote work or relocation.
   

  

 Our humble expectations
   

  

 We’re seeking experienced Software Engineers with a strong background in building scalable microservices. While Kotlin is our primary language, experience with Java, Scala, or other JVM backend languages is great. As we are exploring Go, we're looking for people who are confident in their ability to learn and teach! 🛠️
   

  

 Beyond technical expertise, we value ownership, collaboration, and a mindset for growth. We think you're a great communicator who thrives in tackling complex challenges, questioning conventions, and working closely with teammates to build reliable, scalable systems. 🚀
   

  

 Next steps
   

  

 We are hiring for multiple open positions across different teams in the Merchant Group. During the initial screening call our Talent Acquisition Partner will discuss with you your expectations and possible domain preferences as well as share more about the group. After the recruiter screening call, during the rest of the interviewing steps, you’ll meet hiring managers and software engineers from the Merchant group, a specific team being proposed at the end of the process - that’s the moment when you’ll get to meet your possible Team Lead. Throughout the process, we will do our best to match your experience, skills, and aspirations with the most suitable Engineering team!
   

  

 Our Commitment to Diversity and Inclusion
   

  

 We’re committed to growing and empowering a more inclusive community within our company, industry, and cities. That’s why we hire and cultivate diverse teams of people from all backgrounds, experiences, and perspectives. We believe that true innovation happens when everyone has room at the table and the tools, resources, and opportunity to excel.

title: Säljande Lösningsarkitekt – Microsoft Security
description:
Ta chansen och var med på vår tillväxtresa. Hos oss får du arbeta med världsledande teknologier från Microsoft i ett framgångsrikt säljteam.
   

  

 Atea söker nu en säljande lösningsarkitekt inom Microsoft Security. Vi letar efter dig som har flera års erfarenhet inom området, brinner för att skapa värde för våra kunder och vill ta en ledande roll i vårt växande team. Du kommer vara anställd i det nationella Microsoft-teamet inom Atea Software Cloud och Services, men rollen innebär även ett nära samarbete med andra avdelningar inom Atea, så som vårt nationella säkerhetsteam, våra olika affärsområden och våra regioner.
   

  

 Hos Atea får du möjlighet att växa både professionellt och som människa. Vi erbjuder dig en arbetsplats som präglas av medarbetare som brinner för att bygga Sverige med IT, tar personligt ansvar och sätter laget före jaget. Vi kallar oss stolt för landslaget i informationsteknologi.
   

  

**Din roll**
 Som säljande lösningsarkitekt hos oss arbetar du nära kunder, leverantör och kollegor med att designa och sälja avancerade säkerhetslösningar baserade på Microsofts plattformar. Du har öga för affären och förstår värdet av att omsätta teknik till konkreta verksamhetsnyttor. Du kommer få stort mandat att driva affärer från ax till limpa och är en självklar rådgivare för både kunder och interna team.
   

  

 Kunderna finns både inom privat och offentlig sektor. Till din hjälp har du ett av IT-branschens starkaste varumärken, ett säljteam med kollegor som sätter laget för jaget samt en vältrimmad leveransorganisation.
   

  

 Dina huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter:
   

  

* Driva och utveckla affärer inom Microsoft Security tillsammans med kollegor från vårt nationella säkerhetsteam, våra olika affärsområden och våra regioner.
* Agera rådgivare och kravställare i kunddialoger, både på strategisk och teknisk nivå.
* Ta fram och presentera lösningsförslag, genomföra behovsanalyser och delta i offertarbeten.
* Hålla dig uppdaterad om den senaste utvecklingen inom Microsofts säkerhetsportfölj.
* Bygga starka och långsiktiga relationer med såväl kunder som internt och med leverantörer.


**Vem är du?**
 Vi tror på dig och dina personliga egenskaper, som också är avgörande för att du ska lyckas i rollen och trivas hos oss. Du är driven i ditt arbete och motiveras av att göra affärer och hjälpa våra kunder. Du tar fullt ansvar för dina arbetsuppgifter och är van att driva dina processer framåt på ett strukturerat och självständigt sätt mot tydliga deadlines och mål. Du är bra på att skapa relationer, ger ett förtroendeingivande intryck och har alltid kundens bästa i fokus. Du söker lösningar på uppkomna problem, gillar utmaningar och fungerar konstruktivt både på egen hand och i grupp.
   

  

 För att lyckas i rollen tror vi även att du:
   

  

* Är drivande och trivs med att ta initiativ.
* Har en målinriktad inställning och sporras av att nå och överträffa uppsatta mål.
* Är senior inom Microsoft Security – du har gedigen erfarenhet av att designa och implementera lösningar inom exempelvis Microsoft Sentinel, Defender, Entra och andra säkerhetsprodukter inom Microsoft 365/Azure.
* Har dokumenterad erfarenhet av kundkontakt och försäljning av komplexa lösningar.
* Drivs av att guida dina kunder framåt på deras digitaliseringsresa och att försöka förtjäna förtroendet som deras betrodda rådgivare
* Uppskattar att arbeta i team men har inga problem att ta ett självständigt ansvar.


**Om Atea**
 Visste du att Atea är den ledande leverantören av it-infrastruktur i Norden och Baltikum? I Sverige är vi runt 2700 medarbetare fördelade på 35 kontor runt om i hela landet. Vår styrka ligger i vår kombination av lokal närvaro, vårt omfattande och heltäckande erbjudande samt alla våra specialister. Tillsammans med våra kunder och partners bygger vi Sverige med it och förbättra vardagen för skolbarn, lärare, äldre, sjukvård och näringslivet. Hos oss får du vara en del av världens mest hållbara it-servicebolag, där vi är med och påskyndar omställningen mot en mer hållbar it-värld.
   

  

 På Atea blir du en del av en vardag och en kultur som präglas av framåtanda, laganda och humor. Vi har en vision om att vara "The Place to Be" – en plats där alla växer och trivs, med kollegor som bryr sig om dig, om kunderna och om samhället.
   

  

**Kontakt & mer information**
 Har du frågor om tjänsten är du varmt välkommen att kontakta Tomas Persson, Sales Manager, via tomas.persson@atea.se . Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande och tjänsten kan tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdatum, ansök därmed redan idag!
   

  

 Som en kvalitativ del i vår rekryteringsprocess genomgår slutkandidater en bakgrundskontroll, detta för att öka kännedomen om dig som vår framtida medarbetare.
   

  

 Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!
   

  

 Den här rekryteringen hanteras av oss på Atea och vi undanber oss därför samtal och mail från rekryterings- och bemanningsföretag.
   

  

**Följ oss i sociala medier**

title: Senior Backend Engineer (C# & AWS)
description:
Northmill Bank is a pioneering financial institution at the intersection of technology and finance, committed to revolutionizing the way people manage and protect their financial well-being. We are creating a different kind of banking experience,
 **digital yet personal** 
 .
   

  

 Northmill Bank was founded in 2006 and have grown to over 170 employees in 4 countries, 2.500 merchants and 600.000 end users. We use the latest technology to develop safe, smart, and user-friendly products for our customers. They are the sole reason why we do what we do. We are a product company where technology is the driver to create smarter banking products.
   

  

 Grab this opportunity to be a part of us and our journey!
   

  

**The Scope Of Your Role**
* As a Senior Backend Engineer, you will take part in the process of the design and development of modern financial applications.
* You will develop advanced monitoring systems used in running operations in the AWS cloud environments.
* You will have an impact on our applications by working closely with businesses and clients who use our banking products.
* You will work with C#, .NET, ASP.NET, AWS ( incl. fargate, lambda, S3, event bridge), Jira, Confluence, Git, and Rider/Visual Studio.
* You will use DDD and CQRS.
* You will work using modern AI dev tools.


**Required Qualifications**
* 5+ years of commercial experience in creating web applications.
* Solid experience developing applications using C#.
* Solid experience in working with SQL databases.
* Willingness and interest to collaborate and work in a team.
* Stockholm as a place of living & SE citizenship or EES Resident status.


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Experience with software engineering best practices (code reviews, continuous integration, continuous deployment, testing).
* Exposure to Agile development methodologies.
* Familiar with Web services/web API.
* Familiar with the AWS platform.
* Experience in working with NoSQL databases.


**About you?**
 You are a creative and curious person with a genuine interest in software development. We are always looking for new knowledge and have a curiosity out of this world, we think that you have the same mindset and you are excited to read about the latest tech trends. You might also, like us, love to write nice and high-quality code.
   

  

 We hope you are not afraid to inform us about problems and have your thoughts on various solutions.
   

  

 You are a team player and used to work in an Agile environment.
   

  

 Since we are a multicultural team English is the required language.
   

  

**Fun Facts**
* A non-corporate atmosphere full of openness to innovation, improvement, teamwork, and a data-driven approach.
* Work-life balance: Hit the gym two minutes away or go for a jog in the city center.
* Highly appreciated “Northchill" afterworks and "Northcon" (a frequent conference abroad)
* Health: A high yearly wellness contribution, monthly visits from a massage therapist at the office at an affordable cost, or a treadmill in one of the conference rooms.
* Breakfast and fruits every day, as well as "holy fika” each Friday.
* Regular after work and celebrated successes at the office.
* Stockholm's most beautiful office space that the city has to offer, right in the city center with incredible views and our very own rooftop terrace.


**Apply today and be a part of Northmill!**
 Northmill is a tech company with a banking license aiming to improve financial life, offer merchants smart solutions and erase the borders between in-store and online.
   

  

 Northmill creates a more personal and relevant experience for people and companies, helping more than 2,500 merchants and 600,000 end users.
   

  

**Saved for users** 
 31 MSEK
   

  

**Trustpilot** 
 4.6 of 5
   

  

**Cloud** 
 100 %
   

  

**End users** 
 600 000

title: Named Account Executive - Norway
description:
SLSQ127R58
   

  

 Want to help solve the world's toughest problems with data and AI? This is what we do every day at Databricks.
   

  

 We are looking for a creative, delivery-oriented Named Enterprise Account Executive to join the team in the Nordics to maximise the phenomenal market opportunity that exists for Databricks within the Norwegian market. As an Account Executive selling into Norway, you will be based in Sweden or Denmark and will fly in and fly out of Norway to visit customers.
   

  

 You will know how to sell innovation and value to existing customers, identify new use cases and grow consumption and can guide deals forward to compress decision cycles. You love understanding a product in depth and are passionate about communicating its value to customers and partners. You will be offered huge potential for career progression with the pace of the team's growth.
   

  

 You will report to the Sales Director for Enterprise Sales, Denmark and Norway.
   

  

**The Impact You Will Have**
* Assess your territory and develop a successful execution strategy
* Drive quarter-on-quarter consumption growth in existing accounts
* Exceed activity and quarterly revenue targets
* Track all customer details including use case, purchase time frames, next steps, and forecasting in Salesforce
* Identify new use case opportunities and showcase value to existing customers
* Promote the value of the Databricks' Data Intelligence Platform
* Orchestrate and utilise our field engineering teams to ensure valuable outcomes for clients
* Build and demonstrate value with all engagements to guide successful negotiations to close point


**What We Look For**
* Extensive understanding of the data platform, open source and cloud ecosystems
* Highly skilled in prospecting research and the ability to map out key stakeholders
* Demonstrated success in Value Selling and developing a mutual action plan
* Ability to influence decision-making and strategy with customer leadership teams
* Ability to establish credibility with the C-suite
* Adept in selling to technical buyers
* Experience growing consumption and closing commit deals in a direct sales role
* Mastery of MEDDPICC
* Bachelor's Degree or relevant work experience
* Fluency in English is required; fluency in Norweign is preferred


**About Databricks**
 Databricks is the data and AI company. More than 10,000 organizations worldwide — including Comcast, Condé Nast, Grammarly, and over 50% of the Fortune 500 — rely on the Databricks Data Intelligence Platform to unify and democratize data, analytics and AI. Databricks is headquartered in San Francisco, with offices around the globe and was founded by the original creators of Lakehouse, Apache Spark™, Delta Lake and MLflow. To learn more, follow Databricks on Twitter, LinkedIn and Facebook.
   

  

**Benefits**
 At Databricks, we strive to provide comprehensive benefits and perks that meet the needs of all of our employees. For specific details on the benefits offered in your region, please visit https://www.mybenefitsnow.com/databricks.
   

  

**Our Commitment to Diversity and Inclusion**
 At Databricks, we are committed to fostering a diverse and inclusive culture where everyone can excel. We take great care to ensure that our hiring practices are inclusive and meet equal employment opportunity standards. Individuals looking for employment at Databricks are considered without regard to age, color, disability, ethnicity, family or marital status, gender identity or expression, language, national origin, physical and mental ability, political affiliation, race, religion, sexual orientation, socio-economic status, veteran status, and other protected characteristics.
   

  

**Compliance**
**If access to export-controlled technology or source code is required for performance of job duties, it is within Employer's discretion whether to apply for a U.S. government license for such positions, and Employer may decline to proceed with an applicant on this basis alone.**

title: Principal Architect / Enterprise Architect med fokus på digital handel
description:
**Information om rollen**
 Stelltec Växer! Med En Stark Efterfrågan På Våra Konsulter Och En Ambitiös Tillväxtplan Så Behöver Vi Stärka Upp Vårt Team Med Duktiga Arkitekter. Du Kommer Att Vara Konsult Och Rådgivare För Våra Kunder i Deras Transformationsresor Med Särskilt Fokus På Det Tekniska Ekosystemet Runt Digital Handel, Både Strategiskt Och Operativt. Där Kommer Du Bland Annat Arbeta Med Att
   

  

* Översätta kommersiella mål till tydliga målarkitekturer kopplade till kundens tekniska roadmap och definiera tillhörande investeringsbehov.
* Definiera lösningar och integrationsmönster runt digital handel och relaterade områden (exempelvis PIM, CMS, PSP-integrationer, ERP och OMS).
* Definiera icke-funktionella mål (tillgänglighet, prestanda, säkerhet, kostnad) och säkerställa att designen uppfyller dem.
* Leda leverantörsutvärderingar och –upphandlingar (RFI/RFP), utforma leveransbeskrivningar och styra leveranskvalitet.
* Coacha produkt-, teknik- och säkerhetsteam med tydliga KPI:er och ansvar.


**Det Du Har Med Dig**
* Bred erfarenhet av att teknikstrategi och planering av roadmaps ligger i linje med önskade affärsresultat (tillväxt, marginal, kundupplevelse) med ett tydligt TCO/ROI-fokus.
* Domänexpertis inom digital handel och relaterade områden som produktinformation, pris, kampanj, betalningar, orderflöden, orderuppfyllnad, returer etc.
* En bredd inom lösnings- och integrationsarkitektur (REST/GraphQL API:er, eventdrivna mönster, olika kontrakt samt beslutsstöd genom C4/ADR etc.)
* Övergripande kunskap kring säkerhet och lösningsintegritet.
* Övergripande kunskap om prestanda och tillförlitlighet i större lösningar.
* Leveransledarskap och styrning av olika aktörer inom ett program/projekt (offertförfrågningar, urvalskriterier, utformning av arbetssätt, risk-/beroendehantering, acceptanskriteria)


**Det Är Meriterande Om Du Har**
* Praktisk erfarenhet av någon av de större plattformarna på den svenska marknaden (commercetools, Shopify Plus, Optimizely, SAP Commerce) eller liknande och/eller viktiga närliggande plattformar (Contentful/Sanity headless CMS eller system/processer inom OMS)
* Moln-/arkitektur-/säkerhetscertifieringar (exempelvis inom AWS/Azure/GCP).


**Vi Kan Erbjuda Dig**
* En nyckelroll som Principal Architect / Enterprise Architect där du får mandat att påverka och forma våra kunders arkitektur och teknikstrategier inom digital handel.
* Möjligheten att arbeta nära beslutsfattare för att översätta affärsmål till konkreta målarkitekturer och roadmaps som skapar tydligt affärsvärde.
* Utmanande uppdrag hos marknadsledande företag där du får använda din expertis inom digital handel, integrationsmönster, dataflöden och tekniska ekosystem.
* Frihet att växa i en organisation med kort beslutsväg, högt tempo och stor entreprenörsanda – utan begränsningar av ett strikt hierarkiskt ramverk.
* Konkurrenskraftiga villkor och möjlighet att påverka Stelltecs fortsatta utveckling.
* En arbetsmiljö där kunskapsdelning, innovation och affärsutveckling står i centrum – kombinerat med sociala och inspirerande aktiviteter på vårt kontor vid Norrmalmstorg.


**På** 
**Stelltec får du …**
 …vara med och utveckla ett innovativt och nytänkande företag från start. Du handplockas till spännande uppdrag hos både svenska och internationella företag där din kunskap och genomförandekraft är avgörande. Samtidigt blir du en del av Newground Alliance – en stark allians av etablerade konsultbolag inom olika nischer. Här får du möjlighet att samarbeta, utvecklas och dela kunskap med över 280 erfarna konsulter.
   

  

 Våra konsulter bidrar med stor erfarenhet, djup kunskap och insikt i vad som krävs för att framgångsrikt genomföra programvaru-, plattforms- och teknikimplementeringar. Stelltec har den kompetens våra kunder behöver för att skapa momentum, driva affärsvärde och uppnå utmärkta resultat.
   

  

 Oavsett om Stelltec tar sig an en digital re-platforming, ett molntransformationsprojekt eller digitalisering av viktiga affärsprocesser, får vi det att hända på ett snabbt, effektivt och kostnadseffektivt sätt. Hantering av projekt, initiativ eller andra leveransfokuserade arbetsflöden är hjärtat i vår verksamhet, och vi tvekar aldrig att ta risker för att bevisa vårt värde.
   

  

 Läs mer på www.stelltec.se.
   

  

**Vi ingår i** 
**Newground Alliance**
 Newground Alliance är en allians av oberoende nischkonsultbolag som tillsammans skapar värdefulla synergieffekter. Alla bolag är ”sina egna” och drivs självständigt, men som konsult har du möjligheter att samverka med konsulter från övriga bolag, ta hjälp av experter och utbyta kunskap. Alla bolagen delar lokaler på Norrmalmstorg vilket skapar spontana och värdefulla möten i vardagen.
   

  

 We are a consulting company focused on IT delivery management. We are a team of experienced, delivery-focused IT consultants with the skills, know-how and passion for taking on our clients’ most challenging projects – maximizing the value of their IT investments. Read more at www.stelltec.se

title: Senior System Architect
description:
Mycronic is a Swedish high-tech company that has been a trusted partner to electronics and display manufacturers worldwide for over 50 years. Today, we continue to grow and serve customers in an expanding variety of industries. What we do shapes the future of technology and, in turn, the way we live our lives tomorrow. The Pattern Generator (PG) division, which you will belong to, holds a unique position in the market as the world's leading supplier of mask writers for production of advanced photomasks. These photomasks are used globally, providing cutting-edge production solutions for high-resolution displays and semiconductor chips. Almost all displays you see around you; TV:s, computers, tablets, mobile phones etc. are manufactured using our technology.
 



  





  





**We Offer** 



* A strategic role where you will have a significant influence on the direction of our most advanced system
* The opportunity to work with new technology and contribute to innovation
* A culture that values collaboration, knowledge sharing, and continuous learning



  





**Work task** 




 As our Senior System Architect, you will lead the work in defining, developing, and securing robust, scalable, and sustainable system architectures for complex environments. You will be the driving force in translating business needs into technical solutions, working closely with product owners, development teams, customers, and other stakeholders. You provide the central architectural perspective that connects and coordinates all engineering disciplines, from software and electronics to mechanics, optics, and lithography. With your experience, you can understand both customer needs and our technical opportunities. We value a mature and pragmatic product development mindset: you know when to push for improvements and when to recognize what already works well.
 



  





 In this role, you will also face the challenge of ensuring that the right decisions are made for different subsystems. This means fostering continuous dialogue around needs, keeping the right balance between a high-level perspective and the necessary technical details, and inspiring active engagement from the people you collaborate with. You will work across many interfaces, navigate different opinions and perspectives, and at the same time have the courage to make decisions that move us forward and help us reach our goals.
 



  





**Furthermore you will...** 



* Conduct architecture reviews and risk assessments as well as secure cross disciplinary technical decisions.
* Support sales at customer specific development by performing requirement analyses and product definition.
* Initialize and establish new external contacts and networks that can contribute to our development efforts and speed.
* Ensure freedom to operate in new projects



  





  





 We are looking for someone curious and eager to invest the time needed to truly understand our product. While the learning curve may take time, for the right person it represents an exciting challenge and a chance to make a real impact. You are a true team player with an open and positive mindset, a strong sense of responsibility, and the ability to thrive in a global, fast-changing environment where your skill in prioritizing, and reprioritizing, will be key to success. You also demonstrate an understanding of the importance of documentation and have the ability to consistently produce it, ensuring clarity and alignment across different stakeholders.
 



  





**On top of that, you have...** 



* At least a Master’s degree in Engineering Physics, electronics, mechatronics or similar
* Several years of work experience within system architecture for complex products containing both hardware and software
* Knowledge of Systems Engineering, both in theory and practise
* Experience in defining requirements and balancing requirements between stakeholders and technical solutions
* The ability to lead technical discussions to decisions
* Strong communication skills in both Swedish and English



  





**We see it as a merit if you have...** 



* Knowledge within lithography process, semiconductor or display technology



  





**Additional information** 



* Start: By agreement
* Scope: Full-time
* Location: Täby
* The recruitment process is handled by Academic Work, and Mycronic's wish is that all questions from external applications regarding the position goes to Academic Work.
* Contact details: Senior Recruitment Consultant Johanna Sörell, johanna.sorell@academicwork.se and Recruitment Coordinator Minna Loosaar, minna.loosaar@academicwork.se



  





**Our recruitment process** 



* Phone interview with Academic Work
* Personality & problem-solving test
* In-depth interview with Academic Work
* Interviews with Mycronic
* References + decision

title: Master's thesis; On-device Learning for Resource-constrained IoT devices
description:
We have an open position for a dedicated master student to join us at the Connected Intelligence research unit, within the Computer Science department at RISE.
   

  

**Background and purpose**
 Machine learning (ML) has catalyzed the design and development of various intelligent systems over wide application domains. Many efforts have been made to deploy ML models on resource-constrained devices as well. More recently, the concept of on-device learning (ODL) has gained attention, which means performing both inference and training on local devices. Local devices mostly refer to resource-constrained devices, ranging from smartphones to low-power IoT devices. For example, low-power IoT devices are normally only equipped with memory in the kilobyte range, which brings challenges to the feasibility of ODL. Meanwhile, ODL also comes with the following two main benefits: firstly, ODL alleviates data drift via online adaptation for different deployment scenarios. Secondly, ODL preserves privacy, saves bandwidth, and reduces latency and energy since there is no need to upload data to the cloud and/or download an updated model back.
   

  

**Thesis Description**
 The thesis will focus on investigating the performance, power consumption, memory usage, and computing resources usage of the ODL system on resource-constraint IoT devices. After a thorough literature review of related research works, an ODL system will be designed, implemented, and evaluated.
   

  

**Who are you?**
 We expect you to have good programming skills with C/C++, experience in applying machine learning models, and an interest/curiosity in IoT and embedded systems.
   

  

**Terms**
* Start time: as soon as possible.
* Scope: 30hp (20 weeks)
* Compensation: For an approved thesis project worth 30 credits, we pay a compensation of 39,990 SEK
* Location: RISE Computer Science, Stockholm (Kista). Options to partially work remotely.


**Welcome with your application!**
 To know more, please contact Prof. Thiemo Voigt (thiemo.voigt@ri.se), and Diletta Romano (diletta.romano@ri.se). Applications should include a
 **CV** 
 ,
 **recent grades** 
 , and
 **a code example** 
 . Candidates are encouraged to send in their application as soon as possible but at the latest by the 15th of November 2025. Suitable applicants will be interviewed as soon as applications are received.
   

  

 Keywords: Master thesis, Machine Learning, On-device learning, IoT, RISE, Stockholm

title: Master Thesis: Core Network Traffic Control in a Cloud-Native SBA Environment
description:
**Join our Team**
**About this opportunity:**
 The core network is the central part of cellular networks responsible for managing connections and routing traffic for mobile users. As networks evolve toward a cloud-native, service-based architecture (SBA), traffic control becomes increasingly complex, with indirect communication via a Service Communication Proxy (SCP) and potential shifts to HTTPv3/QUIC. This master’s thesis offers an engaging research opportunity to design, implement, and evaluate a traffic control logic (e.g., load balancing, traffic shaping, or failover) within the SCP, comparing HTTPv3/QUIC against HTTPv2/TCP where feasible. The work aims to address performance, reliability, and governance aspects of core network traffic management in a modern, scalable environment.
   

  

**What you will do:**
* Work on a topic: "Traffic Control for Core SBA Networks over HTTPv3/QUIC: Design, Implementation, and Evaluation via SCP".
* Perform a state-of-the-art literature review on traffic management in cloud-native networks, with a focus on core mobile networks and QUIC-related challenges.
* Analyse architectural options for traffic control in an indirect communication model (SCP), including load balancing, traffic shaping, failover, and policy-driven routing.
* Design and implement the most promising traffic control solution(s) in a development and testing environment that mimics real-world core network conditions.
* Set up evaluation experiments to measure throughput, latency, resilience, and failover behaviour under HTTPv3/QUIC vs HTTPv2/TCP, as time permits.
* Document the study in a master thesis report and deliver an oral presentation with actionable recommendations for future deployments in a cloud-native core network.


**The skills you bring:**
* MSc student in Computer Science/Engineering, Communications Systems, or related fields.
* Strong interest and foundational knowledge in networking protocols (HTTP, TCP) with willingness to learn QUIC and HTTPv3.
* Basic understanding of traffic management concepts in mobile core networks and cloud-native environments (Kubernetes, containers, CNI, service mesh).
* Proficiency with Linux environments (e.g., Ubuntu) and programming skills; Go and Python are preferred.
* Analytical mindset with the ability to translate technical insights into practical recommendations and documentation.


**Benefits of the project:**
* Hands-on experience with cutting-edge core-network technologies in a cloud-native context.
* Opportunities to interact with industry mentors and contribute to a potential publication or internal Ericsson documentation.
* A structured framework for evaluating protocol stacks and traffic-control strategies that can be adapted to other domains within telecom and networking.


 If you are excited by complex systems, enjoy bridging theory and hands-on implementation, and want to contribute to the next generation of core networks, this master’s thesis is a strong fit. Please apply with your CV and a short statement of interest outlining your relevant coursework and any prior project work in networking or cloud-native environments.
   

  

**Why join Ericsson?**
 At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.
   

  

**What happens once you apply?**
 Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.
   

  

 Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. learn more.
   

  

**Primary country and city:** 
 Sweden (SE) || Stockholm

title: SAP Solution Sales Expert (BTM), Sweden
description:
**We help the world run better**
 At SAP, we keep it simple: you bring your best to us, and we'll bring out the best in you. We're builders touching over 20 industries and 80% of global commerce, and we need your unique talents to help shape what's next. The work is challenging – but it matters. You'll find a place where you can be yourself, prioritize your wellbeing, and truly belong. What's in it for you? Constant learning, skill growth, great benefits, and a team that wants you to grow and succeed.
   

  

***SAP Business Transformation Management (BTM)***
 is a new solution area created to support our customer transformation journeys by aligning the four elements of transformation:
 *Processes, Applications, People, and Data* 
 .
   

  

***SAP BTM***
 was built by acquiring the following companies: Signavio (Processes), LeanIX (Enterprise Application Management), and WalkMe (People, Digital Adoption).
   

  

***SAP BTM***
 toolchain powered by AI provides proper support to the most critical SAP initiatives, such as

 , by aligning processes, applications, and people with business strategies, goals, and priorities.
 **SAP BTM** 
 supports the

 and

 exercises to get the best from our Cloud Solution portfolio (Cloud ERP (RISE & GROW), Cloud LoBs) and maintain sustainable value realization.
   

  

 The

 ’ primary responsibilities include execution, prospecting, qualifying, selling, and closing new business to existing and net new customers.
   

  

**EXPECTATIONS AND TASKS**

Builds a foundation on which to harvest future business opportunities and accurate account information and coaching.

Review public information (e.g. new executive appointments, earnings statements, press releases) for the company and its competitors to remain updated on key industry trends and issues impacting the prospect.

 Demand Generation, Pipeline and Opportunity Management

**Work Experience**

* Proven track record in business application software sales: big deals, value deals, customer long-term engagement strategy

**Education And Qualifications / Skills And Competencies**
* Bachelor equivalent
* Master’s in business administration desired
* Certification in Business Process Management and/or Enterprise Architecture desi


**Kindly provide both CV and Cover Letter in order to be considered for the role**
**Bring out your best**
